summary: Implements a base encoder‑decoder RNNT model that operates on byte‑pair‑encoding subword units, managing configuration, dataset preparation, decoding strategies, vocabulary updates and model discovery within the NeMo ASR framework.
business_intent: Enable developers to build, train, evaluate and deploy speech‑to‑text systems using RNNT architecture with subword tokenization, streamlining ASR model development and integration.
